name: A Goblin in Lobbenstrang
description:
Play in fullscreen (icon on bottom right)!

There's a Goblin on the loose in the quaint town of Lobbenstrang. A point-and-click adventure with 5 endings!

Special thanks

Karina Popp, my Code Lab 0 professor and for helping me with the webgl build

Julian Spinelli, for helping me squash some bugs
